text: aur jo log khuda kee khushanoodee ke lie aur apane dilee etaqaad se apane maal kharch karate hain unakee misaal us (hare bhare) baag kee see hai jo kisee teele ya teekare par laga ho aur us par zor shor se paanee barasa to apane dugane phal laaya aur agar us par bade dhadalle ka paanee na bhee barase to usake liye halkee phuaar (hee kaafee) hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usakee dekhabhaal karata rahata hai
